description: Parks Canada wants to hire a contractor for the restoration work in Forillon National Park. The contractor must renovate the former Route 132 That was developed in 2014 the wrong way unnecessarily avoiding visiting tourists to the edge of the large Might Bras valley and Dispairl pea
full_summary:
**Title**
Stage 1 - Road Restoration 5.9 km, Forillon National Park

**Reference and Solicitation Information**

* Solicitation Number: 5P468-23-0285/A
* Reference Number: cb-119-49654449
* Amendment Number: 7
* Publication Date: 2024-02-15
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-03-07, 14:00:00

**Notice Information**

* Tender Status: Expired
* Notice Type: Invitation to Qualify
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Traditional

**Work Description**

Parks Canada Agency (PCA) invites qualified bidders to submit a bid for the restoration of an abandoned section of Route 132 in Forillon National Park. The project aims to renaturalize approximately 5.9 kilometers of abandoned road, reconnecting the forest and aquatic environments on either side of the former road corridor. The work includes:

* Removing culverts and pavement, excavating, backfilling, transporting, stockpiling, and reusing granular materials
* Restoring forest and aquatic environments
* Preparing surfaces for renaturalization

The work will be carried out in a busy area of the park, which will be closed for the duration of the project. The contractor must comply with federal and provincial regulations applicable to the work, including the National Parks Act and Regulations, the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, and the Quebec Occupational Health and Safety Regulations.

**Timeline**

* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-03-29
* Expected Contract End Date: 2025-05-15
* Submission Deadline: 2024-03-07, 14:00:00

**Evaluation Criteria**

* The selection process will consist of two stages: qualification and financial evaluation
* Bidders will be evaluated based on their qualifications and financial proposals

**Submission Requirements**

* Bidders must submit their documents via email to soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca
* Late submissions will not be accepted
* The maximum email file size is 15 megabytes

**Contact Information**

* Contact Person: Cloë Pelland Tessier
* Email: cloe.pelland-tessier@pc.gc.ca
* Phone: (418) 928-7252
* Fax: 1-855-983-1808

This tender is open to Canadian suppliers who meet the qualifications and have the necessary experience and expertise to perform the work. Only those who
